Sector Exposure Asset Mix Geographic Exposure Accounts Net Worth Increase Money Out Net Contributions Add an External Asset Edit Asset Gain a more complete picture of your net worth by adding an asset here. This will show up under the External Asset section and update your total net worth balance. We will also include it in your net worth projections using the annual growth rate you provide.
